channel.title: I need help with pimp scape!
channel.description: alrite i have pimpscape and i have it running and everything..... i just need to know how to make myself an admin and how to edit all the shops and everything and uhmm if you wanna get on my server its hamachi is GangsterPkScape and the pass is gangster the IP is 5.57.153.137 if you wanna get on and talk to me there it would be a great help thanks[br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 01:18:59 AM[/size][hr]is there anyone on because i really need help i have no idea what i am doing at this moment

item.title: I need help with pimp scape!
item.dc:creator: @tuppatsch tuppatsch
item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

to make urself an admin… go to characters and change player rights to 3

to eddit shops go to shops.cfg (drag it onto notepad to open it)

and open items.cfg (same way) and u can adjust prices of items and thier stats

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with pimp scape!

item.title: I need help with pimp scape!
item.dc:creator: @skys_shadow skys shadow
item.description:
@skys_shadow wrote:

well to make yourself admin open up your client.java and search for moderator. You should come up with something that says start of moderator/admin list. If you don’t, keep searching untill you find it. When you do, put your name in one of the quotes that has player rights =3 or =2. I’ll post shop stuff soon.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 29, 2006, 01:49:33 AM[/size][hr]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,27880.0.html thanks to v i d o for that tut

on http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,27883.0.html (which is changing prices) the number to divide by is 1.26875. You’ll understand what i’m talking about once you read it.

Read full topic
